name: ARWIN
goal:
ARWIN is the first investment platform specifically dedicated to circular economy opportunities while relying on three assets: industrial expertise, investment competence, and global understanding of the economic & regulatory ecosystem.
ARWIN's financing activities rely - among others - on a project called (RE)SET, a European accelerator 100% dedicated to innovations in the Circular Economy. (RE)SET approach is simple: to associate the leaders of each industrial ecosystem with the best environmental innovations, so that they can collaborate effectively and deploy concrete solutions adapted to the needs and projects of companies.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Circular economy Package (Waste, Reuse, Water, Interface with Chemicals, Plastics, etc.), Ecodesign, Renewable Energy, Sustainable Finance.
